content.text:
Perfect! I've successfully created a pull request for the changes. Here's what was accomplished:

**Pull Request Created**: https://github.com/nrwl/nx/pull/31479

The PR adds "ndcunningham" to the list of authorized users in the Claude workflow file (`.github/workflows/claude.yml`), which will allow them to trigger the Claude AI assistant by mentioning `@claude` in GitHub interactions.

The change follows the proper:
- Conventional commit format (`feat(repo):`)
- All validation checks passed
- PR template was properly filled out with current behavior, expected behavior, and related context
